pages.title: Ornamental Tree Spider
pages.text: Poecilotheria regalis is a species of arboreal tarantula and is found in parts of India.$(br2)The common name for this spider is Indian ornamental tree spider, or simply Indian ornamental.$(br2)It is one of the most popular arboreal tarantulas for amateur collectors.

pages.title: Ornamental Tree Spider
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
